item.title: Snoop Dogg’s Rep Says Comments Addressing Backlash Over His Criticism of LGBTQ Representation Are “Fake”
item.description: The rapper previously said the same-sex couple included in the 2022 Disney movie ‘Lightyear’ “threw me for a loop.”

item.title: Snoop Dogg’s Rep Says Comments Addressing Backlash Over His Criticism of LGBTQ Representation Are “Fake”
item.description: The rapper previously said the same-sex couple included in the 2022 Disney movie ‘Lightyear’ “threw me for a loop.”

item.title: Snoop Dogg Addresses Backlash Over His Criticism of LGBTQ Representation in ‘Lightyear’: “I’m Not Perfect”
item.description: The Grammy winner previously said the same-sex couple included the 2022 Disney movie “threw me for a loop.”

item.title: Snoop Dogg Criticizes LGBTQ Representation in Disney’s ‘Lightyear’: “It Threw Me for a Loop”
item.description: The rapper said he went to see the 2022 animated film with his grandchildren, which resulted in them asking him several questions about same-sex couples.
